short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and manage prompts for different LLMs including ChatGPT, Claude, CoPilot, and Gemini

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LLM Prompt Saver is a user-friendly Chrome extension designed to streamline your interactions with multiple Language Learning Models (LLMs). It allows you to effortlessly save, manage, and reuse up to five prompts each for most of the major LLMs. With a clean interface featuring a large text area for comfortable editing, users can easily switch between LLMs, save new prompts, and access their stored prompts with options to copy, load for editing, or delete as needed. This tool is perfect for researchers, writers, developers, and anyone who frequently uses multiple LLMs and wants to maintain consistency and efficiency in their AI interactions, ultimately boosting productivity and streamlining workflow.
